body:
Anime Night was a group created by Me, Doozie and Zieno last summer. Its a group where we start a skype call, and start watching Anime at Midnight (EST). The whole group votes on whether it should be a Movie/Series, and which one. 

We either watch a full movie, or 2 episodes of a series each night, depending on the choice for that night. (If a series is voted, we watch that until finished).

This group is only done over the summer, and I shut it down until next summer.

Application Format
Are you a weeaboo?
Do you like Chipotle?
Religion (Catholicism/Other)?
What do you study (Doctor Suess/Girl Crossed the Road/Nicolas Cage)?
Skype?
Favorite Anime? Why?
Active?

Current Group (Including Me)
Glitchy1
MLGtino
PieZ
lgmatias
Emmaye
Lyyris
Upsoar
Juano
Cole1crc
KatLikesPie
GalaxyBrit
Doozie
Sho
PraecanoVenen

title: Anime Night! Season 2 :D

replies.body:
• Are you a weeaboo? No. Fuck weeaboos.
  • Do you like Chipotle? No.
  • Religion (Catholicism or Other)? No.
  • What do you study (Doctor Suess/Girl Crossed the Road/Nicolas Cage)? No.
  • Favorite Anime? Why? Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso. Good art, good music, amazing story.
  • Active? Hope to be. EU timezone though but I don't usually sleep for more than 4 hours so I should be fine.
  • You should have my skype but if not you should be able to add me from the insidia chat. Don't bother adding me if you're going to watch some shit like SAO or Akame ga Kill.

replies.body:
Are you a weeaboo? a little, at home sort of
Do you like Chipotle? Haven't tried it but does Shawarma count?
Religion (Catholicism/Other)? No
What do you study (Doctor Suess/Girl Crossed the Road/Nicolas Cage)? No
Skype? Kirito-San
Favorite Anime? Why? Sword Art Online (If you want another answer then it would be Nisekoi, Interesting/Good Concept (in filipino we would say "nakakaiba" which means its something never seen before or different), Characters and Fanservice
Active? Not sure since im from Asia our timezones would be different and i've just started my 10th grade
so idk how it could work but if there are other ppl from/within the Asian timezones that would join then i might
as well be in it if ever i have free time

Parasyte
Black Butler
and many more c::
Active? I sometimes have school as a barrier but yeah I try to be.
